author: tboehme
msg: as announced on PDFBOX-1199 this adds new input stream class with buffering and seek functionality;
PushBackInputStream is extended to support seek operation if the underlying stream implements RandomAccessRead

msg: [IO-320] Add XmlStreamReader support for UTF-32. Order annotation.
